Room.Name: Delaney Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Delaney Road, between the barracks and the library.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest North City Guard Barracks are located on the west side of the road. Most of the City Guards who are stationed here patrol the Northwestern Observational Station and the City Walls. On the east side of the road is the Oceancrest Municipal Library. The entrance to the Library is located off of Hofton Avenue or Darmanian Way.
